display_name: PSG Results: Calculated - RDI in supine body position (>= 4% desaturation)
description: missing if sleep time in supine position is 0 or if position sensore was not working or if studies scored as sleep/wake
calculation: rdim4ps  = 60*(hrembp4 + hnrbp4 + carbp4 + canbp4 + oarbp4 + oanbp4 + marbp4 + manrbp4)/(remepbp+nremepbp)
